events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to get a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specializing in refunds to assist the customer efficiently.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about your order mix-up. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Thank you for responding quickly. My order number is 123456789, and I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got.
We verified the issue and are processing a full refund to your original payment method. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for handling this so promptly. I appreciate the refund process starting quickly and look forward to receiving confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please expect the amount to appear on your statement within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in—please let us know if you received your refund or if you need any further assistance with your order.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback about your recent support experience. Your input is valuable to us.
